original_text: At noon, Elijah began to laugh at them. ‘Shout louder!’ he said. ‘He is a god, isn't he? Maybe he is thinking about something else! Or has he left the room for a moment? Maybe he has gone away from home on a journey. Or perhaps he is asleep and you need to wake him up!’
korean_text: 정오에 이르러는 엘리야가 그들을 조롱하여 이르되 큰 소리로 부르라 그는 신인즉 묵상하고 있는지 혹은 그가 잠깐 나갔는지 혹은 그가 길을 행하는지 혹은 그가 잠이 들어서 깨워야 할 것인지 하매

sentences.original_text: At noon, Elijah began to laugh at them.
Maybe he is thinking about something else!
sentences.korean_translation: 아마 그는 다른 것을 생각하고 있을지도 모릅니다!

sentences.original_text: Or has he left the room for a moment?
Maybe he has gone away from home on a journey.
sentences.korean_translation: 아마 그는 집을 떠나 여행을 떠났을지도 모릅니다.

sentences.original_text: and you need to wake him up!'
